text: Uveshchevay (o Mukhammad!) etim Koranom tekh, kotoryye so strakhom zhdut Sudnogo dnya, kogda angely soberut ikh pered Gospodom, chtoby poluchit' vozdayaniye i nakazaniye, kogda u nikh ne budet ni pokrovitelya, ni zastupnika bez dozvoleniya Allakha. Eto - chtoby bogoboyaznennyye otklonilis' ot togo, chto vyzyvayet gnev Allakha
